      • roomExists

        public boolean roomExists(int xPosition2,
                          int i)
        Description copied from class: GameObject
        This method checks to see if there is a room at the given location passed to it. It does this by using xposition2 and i as the position of the checked object, then using an if statement will determine if that position is occupied by a Room object. If it is, it returns false, if it is not, then it returns true.
        Overrides:
        roomExists in class GameObject
        Parameters:
        xPosition2 -
        i -
        Returns:
